pr_title: refactor(phoneHome): Create a handler interface for provider specific…

timeline.message: refactor(phoneHome): Create a handler interface for provider specific data.

timeline.bodyText: This class seems unnecessary. Why not just autowire a List< ProviderPhoneHomeHandler> in the PhoneHomeTask and then loop over that? You can still look up the provider configs because ProviderPhoneHomeHandler has a ProviderKey.
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: This is just for a more efficient way to look up the provider handler.  We would have to have another for loop or a filter stream to find the handler for each provider.  With this it would be a constant time lookup of the provider key.  I can simply put in a stream to filter the handlers based on key.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.message: refactor(phoneHome): Delete PhoneHomeHandlerMap and update PhoneHomeTask.
